00002 #define _GAME_CELL_STORE_H

00004 /*
00005   Cell storage.
00006 
00007   Used to load, look up and store all references in a single cell.
00008 
00009   Depends on esm/loadcell.hpp (loading from ESM) and esm_store.hpp
00010   (looking up references.) Neither of these modules depend on us.
00011  */
00012

00034   template <typename X, typename D>
00035   struct LiveCellRef
00036   {
00037     LiveCellRef(const CellRef& cref, const X* b = NULL) : base(b), ref(cref),
00038                                                           mData(ref) {}
00039                                                           
00040 
00041     LiveCellRef(const X* b = NULL) : base(b), mData(ref) {}
00042 
00043     // The object that this instance is based on.
00044     const X* base;
00045 
00046     /* Information about this instance, such as 3D location and
00047        rotation and individual type-dependent data.
00048     */
00049     CellRef ref;
00050 
00052     D mData;
00053   };
00054 
00056   template <typename X, typename D>
00057   struct CellRefList
00058   {
00059     typedef LiveCellRef<X, D> LiveRef;
00060     typedef std::list<LiveRef> List;
00061     List list;
00062 
00063     // Search for the given reference in the given reclist from
00064     // ESMStore. Insert the reference into the list if a match is
00065     // found. If not, throw an exception.
00066     template <typename Y>
00067     void find(CellRef &ref, const Y& recList)
00068     {
00069       const X* obj = recList.find(ref.refID);
00070       if(obj == NULL)
00071         throw std::runtime_error("Error resolving cell reference " + ref.refID);
00072 
00073       list.push_back(LiveRef(ref, obj));
00074     }
00075 
00076     LiveRef *find (const std::string& name)
00077     {
00078         for (typename std::list<LiveRef>::iterator iter (list.begin()); iter!=list.end(); ++iter)
00079         {
00080             if (iter->ref.refID==name)
00081                 return &*iter;
00082         }
00083 
00084         return 0;
00085     }
00086   };
00087 
00089   template <typename D>
00090   class CellStore
00091   {
00092   public:
00093 
00094     enum State
00095     {
00096         State_Unloaded, State_Preloaded, State_Loaded
00097     };
00098 
00099     CellStore (const ESM::Cell *cell_) : cell (cell_), mState (State_Unloaded) {}
00100 
00101     const ESM::Cell *cell;
00102     State mState;
00103     std::vector<std::string> mIds;
00104 
00105     // Lists for each individual object type
00106     CellRefList<Activator, D>         activators;
00107     CellRefList<Potion, D>            potions;
00108     CellRefList<Apparatus, D>         appas;
00109     CellRefList<Armor, D>             armors;
00110     CellRefList<Book, D>              books;
00111     CellRefList<Clothing, D>          clothes;
00112     CellRefList<Container, D>         containers;
00113     CellRefList<Creature, D>          creatures;
00114     CellRefList<Door, D>              doors;
00115     CellRefList<Ingredient, D>        ingreds;
00116     CellRefList<CreatureLevList, D>   creatureLists;
00117     CellRefList<ItemLevList, D>       itemLists;
00118     CellRefList<ESM::Light, D>        lights;
00119     CellRefList<Tool, D>              lockpicks;
00120     CellRefList<Miscellaneous, D>              miscItems;
00121     CellRefList<NPC, D>               npcs;
00122     CellRefList<Probe, D>             probes;
00123     CellRefList<Repair, D>            repairs;
00124     CellRefList<Static, D>            statics;
00125     CellRefList<Weapon, D>            weapons;
00126 
00127     void load (const ESMStore &store, ESMReader &esm)
00128     {
00129         if (mState!=State_Loaded)
00130         {
00131             if (mState==State_Preloaded)
00132                 mIds.clear();
00133 
00134             std::cout << "loading cell " << cell->getDescription() << std::endl;
00135 
00136             loadRefs (store, esm);
00137 
00138             mState = State_Loaded;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     void preload (const ESMStore &store, ESMReader &esm)
00143     {
00144         if (mState==State_Unloaded)
00145         {
00146             listRefs (store, esm);
00147 
00148             mState = State_Preloaded;
00149         }
00150     }
00151 
00155     template<class Functor>
00156     bool forEach (Functor& functor)
00157     {
00158         return
00159             forEachImp (functor, activators) &&
00160             forEachImp (functor, potions) &&
00161             forEachImp (functor, appas) &&
00162             forEachImp (functor, armors) &&
00163             forEachImp (functor, books) &&
00164             forEachImp (functor, clothes) &&
00165             forEachImp (functor, containers) &&
00166             forEachImp (functor, creatures) &&
00167             forEachImp (functor, doors) &&
00168             forEachImp (functor, ingreds) &&
00169             forEachImp (functor, creatureLists) &&
00170             forEachImp (functor, itemLists) &&
00171             forEachImp (functor, lights) &&
00172             forEachImp (functor, lockpicks) &&
00173             forEachImp (functor, miscItems) &&
00174             forEachImp (functor, npcs) &&
00175             forEachImp (functor, probes) &&
00176             forEachImp (functor, repairs) &&
00177             forEachImp (functor, statics) &&
00178             forEachImp (functor, weapons);
00179     }
00180 
00181   private:
00182 
00183     template<class Functor, class List>
00184     bool forEachImp (Functor& functor, List& list)
00185     {
00186         for (typename List::List::iterator iter (list.list.begin()); iter!=list.list.end();
00187             ++iter)
00188             if (!functor (iter->ref, iter->mData))
00189                 return false;
00190         
00191         return true;
00192     }
00193 
00195     void listRefs(const ESMStore &store, ESMReader &esm)
00196     {
00197         assert (cell);
00198 
00199         if (cell->context.filename.empty())
00200             return; // this is a dynamically generated cell -> skipping.
00201 
00202         // Reopen the ESM reader and seek to the right position.
00203         cell->restore (esm);
00204 
00205         CellRef ref;
00206 
00207         // Get each reference in turn
00208         while (cell->getNextRef (esm, ref))
00209         {
00210             std::string lowerCase;
00211 
00212             std::transform (ref.refID.begin(), ref.refID.end(), std::back_inserter (lowerCase),
00213                 (int(*)(int)) std::tolower);
00214 
00215             mIds.push_back (lowerCase);
00216         }
00217 
00218         std::sort (mIds.begin(), mIds.end());
00219     }
00220 
00221     void loadRefs(const ESMStore &store, ESMReader &esm)
00222     {
00223       assert (cell);
00224 
00225         if (cell->context.filename.empty())
00226             return; // this is a dynamically generated cell -> skipping.
00227 
00228       // Reopen the ESM reader and seek to the right position.
00229       cell->restore(esm);
00230 
00231       CellRef ref;
00232 
00233       // Get each reference in turn
00234       while(cell->getNextRef(esm, ref))
00235         {
00236             std::string lowerCase;
00237 
00238             std::transform (ref.refID.begin(), ref.refID.end(), std::back_inserter (lowerCase),
00239                 (int(*)(int)) std::tolower);
00240 
00241             int rec = store.find(ref.refID);
00242 
00243             ref.refID = lowerCase;
00244 
00245           /* We can optimize this further by storing the pointer to the
00246              record itself in store.all, so that we don't need to look it
00247              up again here. However, never optimize. There are infinite
00248              opportunities to do that later.
00249            */
00250           switch(rec)
00251             {
00252             case REC_ACTI: activators.find(ref, store.activators); break;
00253             case REC_ALCH: potions.find(ref, store.potions); break;
00254             case REC_APPA: appas.find(ref, store.appas); break;
00255             case REC_ARMO: armors.find(ref, store.armors); break;
00256             case REC_BOOK: books.find(ref, store.books); break;
00257             case REC_CLOT: clothes.find(ref, store.clothes); break;
00258             case REC_CONT: containers.find(ref, store.containers); break;
00259             case REC_CREA: creatures.find(ref, store.creatures); break;
00260             case REC_DOOR: doors.find(ref, store.doors); break;
00261             case REC_INGR: ingreds.find(ref, store.ingreds); break;
00262             case REC_LEVC: creatureLists.find(ref, store.creatureLists); break;
00263             case REC_LEVI: itemLists.find(ref, store.itemLists); break;
00264             case REC_LIGH: lights.find(ref, store.lights); break;
00265             case REC_LOCK: lockpicks.find(ref, store.lockpicks); break;
00266             case REC_MISC: miscItems.find(ref, store.miscItems); break;
00267             case REC_NPC_: npcs.find(ref, store.npcs); break;
00268             case REC_PROB: probes.find(ref, store.probes); break;
00269             case REC_REPA: repairs.find(ref, store.repairs); break;
00270             case REC_STAT: statics.find(ref, store.statics); break;
00271             case REC_WEAP: weapons.find(ref, store.weapons); break;
00272 
00273             case 0: std::cout << "Cell reference " + ref.refID + " not found!\n"; break;
00274             default:
00275               std::cout << "WARNING: Ignoring reference '" << ref.refID << "' of unhandled type\n";
00276             }
00277         }
00278     }
00279 
00280   };
00281 }
